name: Unlimited Bowling
description:
Feel the joy and excitement of bowling as in real life in Unlimited Bowling!

Features:
•Real world dynamic ball hook motions and pin actions make you feel the same satisfaction of hitting a perfect strike as playing bowling in real life!

•In total of 9 challenging oil patterns to bowl on! Bowl like a pro, adapt your game and conquer on any lane conditions!

•Easy and intuitive controls let you bowl in whichever style you like with ease! Stroker, tweener, cranker, straight ball, your choice!

•Real-time multiplayer support in Online Versus mode lets you compete with other online players around the world in a thrilling 1-on-1 match. Can you handle the pressure and get the game-deciding strike?

•Engage in Daily Events and challenge to clinch the titles and top the leaderboards!

•Challenging Versus AI mode to test your bowling skills to the limit!

•Score 300 points or more easily in an action-packed 100-pin game! But scoring a perfect 3000 points game won't be as easy!

•Review every detail of your lucky strike or tough spare in any angle with the instant slow motion replay camera!

•Fun mini game Angry Bowl challenges you to bowl like never before!
